definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to raise eyebrows/to cast sidelong glances (expressing fear or indignation)/shocked/surprised
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片長圓形或線形，直立或開展，基於側配對。

sentences.english: We discussed the shade and also breaking up the shade with slightly lighter laterals and darker canines.
sentences.chinese: 我們討論了色度但是側切牙的色度淺些，尖牙的深點。

sentences.english: The normal saline was injected into the left knee joints as the control.
sentences.chinese: 左側膝關節腔注射生理鹽水，作爲對照側。

sentences.english: Abnormal obturator artery was studied on 148 sides of specimens.
sentences.chinese: 報道了148側屍體標本上異常閉孔動脈的觀察結果。

sentences.english: A top layer is coextensive with and secured to the first side of the synthetic rubber layer.
sentences.chinese: 頂層與合成橡膠層的第一側同延並固定到該第一側。

sentences.english: Other safety standard features include front seat-mounted, side-impact air bags and daytime running lights.
sentences.chinese: 其他安全標準功能包括前座式，側氣囊和日間行駛燈。

sentences.english: As a result, competition has been introduced in generation sector through bid-based operation.
sentences.chinese: 在發電側引入競爭是所有電力市場的共同特點。

sentences.english: Side-impact airbags will be fitted as standard to all cars ordered from May 21.
sentences.chinese: 五月二十一號以後側氣囊也成爲所有車型的標配。

sentences.english: For example, most portables do not have side walls or entrance flaps.
sentences.chinese: 例如，大多數便攜式產品沒有入口側牆壁或皮瓣。

sentences.english: Accumulating heat by water in electric heating boiler is one of the load regulating methods.
sentences.chinese: 電鍋爐水儲熱技術是負荷側調峯技術的一種。

sentences.english: The collision of steel strip with flipper guide was observed on finish rolling unit.
sentences.chinese: 現場觀察發現了鋼板撞擊精軋機組側導板現象。

sentences.english: The curved screw at the femoral calcar was found in the experimental side.
sentences.chinese: 有一隻山羊實驗側螺紋釘出現彎曲，爲股骨距處螺釘。

sentences.english: The side stand is easily put down, and disengages the engine.
sentences.chinese: 側支架可以輕鬆放下，並能同時關閉發動機。

sentences.english: Cutaneous needle was used on the recessive side of spasm limbs of hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 梅花針輕釦偏癱肢體痙攣劣勢側。

sentences.english: Non Touching and tiltable Split Type Bronze Side Platens .
sentences.chinese: 同樣還有非接觸式銅質側擋板。

sentences.english: In the control group, 62 testes underwent scrotal dartos orchiopexy and were followed up.
sentences.chinese: 對照組採用肉膜囊睾丸固定術並得到隨訪62側。
